title.narrative: Jammu and Kashmir Urban Sector Development Investment Program - Tranche 3

description.narrative: Project 3 under the investment program will mainly cover investments in water supply, drainage, and urban transport, which are essential to meet the overall objectives of the investment program.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Average travel time reduced to 10 minutes from Shalamar Chow to Shadhidi Chow (baseline = 20 minutes in 2013).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Average water supply increased to 135 l/d/capita for 21,000 people (48% female) in another area of Jammu through new pipeline (baseline = 20 l/d/capita in 2013 for the area).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Average travel time reduced to 15 minutes from Dal gate to Lal Chow (baseline = 30 minutes in 2013).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Average water supply increased to 135 l/d/capita for 185,000 people (48% female) in Srinagar (baseline = 60 l/d/capita in 2013 for the area).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Average water supply increased to 135 l/d/capita for 261,000 people (48% female) in one area of Jammu through rehabilitation of pipelines (baseline = 90 l/d/capita in 2013).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.

title.narrative: Water logging reduced to 0.3 hours for 1 day in a year in the project area of Srinagar (baseline = 2 hours for 25-30 days in a year in 2013).

description.narrative: improved urban services in Jammu and Srinagar.
